resetToDefaults.content: resetToDefaults()→ None: Set the colors to their default values.

len.content:
len(Colors)→ int: Returns the total color options.
a = len(ui.colors)

[].content:
[<color option name>]→ triplet(r,g,b): Get or set specific color option, given a string key.
n = ui.colors['default.bg']
ui.colors['default.bg'] = (1,0,0)

iterator.content:
Iterator→ str: Iterate over each color option name.
for n in ui.colors:
	print(n)
	ui.colors[n] = myColorsList[n] TouchDesigner Build:
